content: गर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [गीर्यते गॄ-कर्मादौ अच्] Swallowing. --रः {@--1@} Any drink or fluid, beverage. {@--2@} Sickness, disease. {@--3@} Swallowing (गरा also in this sense). {@--4@} A factitious poison. --रः, --रं {@--1@} Poison. {@--2@} An antidote. --रं {@--1@} Sprinkling, wetting. {@--2@} The fifth of the eleven Karaṇas.
